snippet.title: S1E1: Welcome to Storm Wars
snippet.description:
**We recommend watching this video with Closed Captioning turned on (the little CC button). It really helps to follow the points, because there's a bad echo (a couple of the earlier streams have lower sound quality — S1E4 and beyond are good sound-wise).**

We introduce the game and talk about why it's strategic and fun even though it's casual and easy to play. We talk about future plans, show some battles, discuss some deck strategy, and later on we have a special guest appearance! -- Watch live at https://www.twitch.tv/stormwarsgame
